message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $135 for this product. It's a unique item, and I believe that price reflects its true value.
I see your point, Alice. Considering the uniqueness of the product, I'm willing to go up to $130 for it.
